CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the impact to your business?
CustomField.label: Business Impact

value.fullName: Low - Issue or Question with limited business impact
value.label: Low - Issue or Question with limited business impact

value.fullName: Normal - Application issue that has moderate impact to the business
value.label: Normal - Application issue that has moderate impact to the business

value.fullName: High - Serious degradation of application performance or functionality
value.label: High - Serious degradation of application performance or functionality

value.fullName: Critical - Application is down for ALL USERS
value.label: Critical - Application is down for ALL USERS
